title: An Earl Out of Time
description: An impulse buy in an antique shop sends 21st century Special Constable Cassie Lawrence spinning back through time to 1807 and into the middle of a fight in a London alleyway. Someone wants to stop Lucian Franklin, Earl of Radcliffe from finding missing Arabella Trenton, even if it means killing him in the process. Lucian fights back and continues to search for the truth about Miss Trenton’s fate – helped and distracted by this woman from the future who shocks, intrigues and attracts him.The attraction is mutual, dangerous and heart-breaking – Cassie knows she has to get home. Somehow. Lucian knows he has to let her go…eventually. The first in the Time Into Time series of timeshifting historical mysteries from award-winning historical romance author Louise Allen.
author: Louise Allen
